Mystery Mix Monster Biographies - Durahans
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: The /??? Breeds: Mystery Mix Monster Biographies - Durahans
By Farmer Jimbo on Tuesday, May 8, 2001 - 05:19 am:

Ruby Knight (Durahan/???)

StatsCurrentGainsGains(E-A)
Lif1293C
Pow1374B
Int1854B
Ski1123C
Spd791E
Def1474B


Lifepsan: 460
Guts regen: 16 or 1.88 per second
Life Stage Type: 2
Extra attack: Jumping Stab
Drill: +1 Domino
Battle: Will

The Ruby Knight looks suspiciously like a Vesuvious (Durahan/Dragon). Same stat gains, lower than normal lifespan, low guts recovery and same life stage type. The ruby Knight is the only mystery mix Durahan to start off with an extra attack, but you could do better with the two below.


Shogun (Durahan/???)

StatsCurrentGainsGains(E-A)
Lif953C
Pow1373C
Int1434B
Ski1173C
Spd961E
Def1664B


Lifepsan: 540
Guts regen: 13 or 2.31 per second
Life stage type: 2
No extra attacks.
Drill: +1 Domino
Battle: Will

The closest match here to an existing sub-breed would be a Garuda (Durahan/Phoenix). This is quite a nice Durahan with acceptable guts recovery and the lifespan of a Mock.

Kokushi Muso (Durahan/???)

StatsCurrentGainsGains(E-A)
Lif993C
Pow1253C
Int872D
Ski1784B
Spd881E
Def1635A


Lifepsan: 500
Guts regen: 11 or 2.73 per second
Life stage type: 1
No extra attacks.
Drill: +1 Domino
Battle: Gaurd and Hurry

The Kokushi Muso is a spot on match for a Metal Glory (Durahan/Metalner). Same stat gains, life stage type and just look at that guts recovery. Phenominal for a Durahan. Like the Metal Glory though, stat gains could be better. If your trying to decide on a mystery mix Durahan to raise, I'd say it's a toss up between the Shogun and Kokushi Muso.
